Title: Netduino LED Control
Description:
The Netduino LED Control classes provide a mechanism for controlling multiple LEDs using the Netduino family of boards.

These classes allow multiple LEDs to be controlled by using external hardware such as 74HC595 shift registers.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The Netduino LED Control classes provide a mechanism for controlling multiple LEDs using the Netduino family of boards.

These classes allow multiple LEDs to be controlled by using external hardware such as 74HC595 shift registers.

Example of a Running Cube

Here is an example of the LED Control classes controlling and 8x8x8 LED cube in action here.

Building a Cube

You can find instructions for building a cube in the Netduino Wiki.
